abstract.para: Get to know a small history of Joala and what you can expect from this book.

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Joala is an offspring of an internal development project started in 2011 at CoreMedia AG. The origin of Joala is the module conditions. Conditions implement a concept of busy waiting in your tests in order to execute the tests as fast as possible still being able to wait for a state of a given system.
